name: TabView
desc: A view that switches between multiple child views using interactive user interface elements.

items.name: init(selection: Binding<SelectionValue>?, content: () -> Content)
items.desc: Creates an instance that selects from content associated with Selection values.

items.name: func tabViewStyle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the style for the tab view within the current environment.

items.name: protocol TabViewStyle
items.desc: A specification for the appearance and interaction of a TabView.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.

declaration: struct TabView<SelectionValue, Content> where SelectionValue : Hashable, Content : View
